title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4064.7 - When jockey may obtain license to train
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4064.7 - When jockey may obtain license to train

State Regulations

On special application and under exceptional
circumstances, a license to train may be granted to a jockey holding a license
as such, to train for one or more owners. When so licensed as a trainer, a
jockey shall not be permitted to ride any other horses except those trained by
himself or herself. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4064.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
